scammer_persona.claimed_identity: Yilin - investment advisor with knowledge of 'electric gold' opportunities

impersonation_and_psychology.trust_building_period: Not specified - online meeting followed by investment introduction

withdrawal_block_tactics: Complete withdrawal block when victim couldn't pay additional fees

cryptocurrency_types: Electric gold (digital gold currency - specific crypto type not identified)

Whether any successful withdrawals occurred before final block
extraction_metadata.notes: This case follows classic Pig Butchering withdrawal blocking pattern: victim deposits $91,000+, platform shows fake balance of $289,000, then demands $49,000 in 'taxes' to withdraw. The 'electric gold' product name is designed to sound innovative and valuable. Platform is now defunct. High confidence in fraud mechanism details, moderate confidence in initial contact and relationship building aspects due to limited narrative detail.
